name: Mega Meteor Madness
description:
Blast into a good time with this high octane arcade game. Mega Meteor Madness is a timing style arcade game where timing your clicks propel your meteor through obstacles. If you run into black obstacles the round is over and you can give it another go. Use precise timing to go on long streaks and trigger the mega meteor mode which allows you to go faster and even break through normally unbreakable obstacles. Power through levels and rack up your score! Power through endless levels and insane challenges in Mega Meteor Madness.

Features:
Simple Controls(Mouse Click)
Randomized Levels No Two Alike
Endless Levels
Mega Meteor Streaks
Hours Of Fun
